artist: S. Fielding and Company; Railway Pottery; Devon Pottery
creditline: Gift of funds from the Decorative Arts Council
description: tea set made of creamy colored pottery then glazed; now has crazing; decorated with all wooden Dutch dolls known as Peg Woodens, Penny Woodens or Nurnberg Fille, which had black painted hair and orange or deep pink painted slippers; other colors include brown, red and green; set came in the original box
title: “Penny Woodens” Tea Set
